Billing.question: Why is my credit card being charged?
Billing.answer: Your credit card is being charged because you bought something.

Billing.question: How can I upgrade my subscription?
Billing.answer: Click on one of the many upgrade links that we constantly email you about.

Billing.question: Where can I update my payment information?
Billing.answer: Under that big heading called 'Update Payment Info'.

Installation.question: Do you offer a non-profit plan?
Installation.answer: No, due to the physical nature of our product, we can't absorb the cost at the moment. Sign up to our newsletter to find out when we will offer this.

Installation.question: Why is my credit card being charged?
Installation.answer: Your credit card is being charged because you bought something.
